name: Grandma, Please!
description:
• Do not throw me to the Otherworld during Samhain
  • Do not leave me locked up with a bloodthirsty vampire
  • And please please do NOT be so vague about how I can become a full-pledged druid!

But your dead grandmother has done all that and now you have 3 days to survive, pass your right of passage, and decide who to help to achieve that. But it’s not so easy when your (human?) crush refuses to cooperate, your cat familiar made it their mission to annoy everyone, and the vampire is angry enough to kill you.

Date them, help them, or kill them at your own discretion. There are only a million ways to die and a few to achieve your goal.  

Summary

This game is a survival fantasy romance visual novel about a druid-in-training who embarks on her journey to become a full-pledged druid. It has 3 love interests and multiple endings.

 The demo itself contains mainly death endings and some smaller choices that will later affect you in the game.  Due to multiple artists working on this game, there might be some style inconsistencies. Some of the CGs in the gallery will be locked for now, because they will only appear in the full game. One choice will also be locked because it leads directly to Puca's route.

The full game is going to be free.

Content Warning

Although it won't have any depictions of graphic scenes, this game has mature themes includes gore and violence in text only. And some occasional jokes.

Release Schedule

Aibne: October 31st, 2022 or earlier

Abhartach & Puca: TBD
